DOC.brief_summary: Some oxygen conserving devices have been developed to diminish oxygen expense. These devices offer optimisation of oxygen therapy for deambulation by improving time autonomy of patients.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of Two Liquid Oxygen Devices in Deambulation
DOC.criteria: Patients with arterial oxygen desaturation to effort. COPD with TLC > 90% EPID with TLC < 90% and FEV1/FVC > 70% Patients with longterm oxygen therapy (LTOT) in deambulation. Not clinically stable during last month. Smokers
